import React, { useState,useRef, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Row, Col, Collapse, Button } from 'reactstrap'; import "./ItemBuy.css"; import imgItem from "/home/quocthang123/Desktop/Leonardo/leonardo-app/src/components/img/img" import "/home/quocthang123/Desktop/Leonardo/leonardo-app/src/components/itembest/ItemBest.css" import $ from 'jquery'; export default function ItemBuy(){ const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const itemColor = { name: "Túi Hộp Oxford", price: "320.000₫", listColor:[{ color:"gray", imgColor:imgItem[12] }, { color:"black", imgColor:imgItem[14] }] } const responsive = { superLargeDesktop: { // the naming can be any, depends on you. breakpoint: { max: 4000, min: 3000 }, items: 5 }, desktop: { breakpoint: { max: 3000, min: 1024 }, items: 5 }, tablet: { breakpoint: { max: 1024, min: 464 }, items: 2 }, mobile: { breakpoint: { max: 464, min: 0 }, items: 1 } }; const [changeColorItemBest, setChange] = useState({ colorChange: itemColor.listColor[0].imgColor, isChange:false, indexActive: 0 }) $(document).ready(function(){ $(window).on('scroll',function(){ var link = $('.btn-product-buy a'); var top = $(window).scrollTop(); $('.width-product-buy img').each(function(){ var id = $(this).attr('id'); var height = $(this).height(); var offset = $(this).offset().top - 150; if(top >= offset && top < offset + height){ link.removeClass('active'); $('.btn-product-buy').find('[data-scroll="' + id + '"]').addClass('active'); } }); }); }) return(
